articles.title: Explained: How NASA taking Indian astronaut to space station powers ISRO's mega mission - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: The NASA-ISRO collaboration aims to share technological insights and reduce costs, with potential benefits including enhancing India's expertise in human spaceflight, fostering scientific cooperation, and inspiring the younger generation. Girish Linganna expl…
